ctvmft.h

00001 // C header file for CTVMFT developed by Mariner and Berge for CDF
00002 //
00003 //
00004 #ifndef CTVMFT_H
00005 #define CTVMFT_H
00006 
00007 
00008 #define MaxVtx 3   //maximum number of vertices
00009 #define MaxMcn 4   //maximum number of mass constraints
00010 #define MaxTrk 100 //maximum number of tracks
00011 #define MaxItr 10  //maximum number if iteration steps
00012 #define UDIM MaxTrk*(MaxVtx+MaxMcn+60)+ MaxVtx*(MaxVtx+18) + MaxMcn*6 +MaxItr + 31
00013 #define MAXDIM 7*(MaxVtx+1) + 3*MaxTrk + MaxMcn
00014 
00015 
00016 extern "C" {
00017   extern struct {
00018     int RUNNUM,TRGNUM;         // "you can't tell the players without a score card"
00019     int ITER;                  // number of iterative steps taken
00020     int NTSCUT;                // total number of cut steps, this fit
00021     int NVERTX;                // Number of vertices
00022     int NMASSC;                // Number of mass constraints
00023     int NTRACK;                // Fit specification
00024     int TRKVTX[MaxVtx][MaxTrk];// (Vertex,Track) association table
00025     int TRKMCN[MaxMcn][MaxTrk];// (Mass_Constraint,Track) table
00026     int VTXPNT[2][MaxVtx];     // vertex association information
00027     float CMASS[MaxMcn];       // Constraint mass
00028     int CVTX[MaxVtx];          // Conversion constraint specification
00029     int VTXVTX[MaxVtx][MaxVtx];// vertex geneology
00030     char TKBANK[MaxTrk][4];    // Track bank type (e.g. 'TRKS')
00031     int LIST[MaxTrk];          // Track bank number
00032     float TMASS[MaxTrk];         // Track mass assignment
00033     int MATDIM;                // Dimension of the matrix, this fit
00034     int TKERR[MaxTrk];         // Track "error memory"
00035     int NDOF;                  // Fit number of degrees of freedom
00036     float CHISQR[MaxItr+1];    // Overall fit Chi Square result
00037     float CHIT[MaxTrk];        // Track contribution to Chi Square
00038     float CHIV[MaxVtx+1];      // Vertex fit Chi Squares
00039     float XYZPV0[3];           // "Primary" vertex; XYZ
00040     float EXYZPV[3][3];        // "Primary" vertex; covariance
00041     float XYZVRT[MaxVtx+1][3]; // Primary, Secondary vertices
00042     float DXYZPV[3];           // Primary vertex displacement in fit
00043     float PAR[MaxTrk][5];      // Fitted track helix parameters(CDF notation!)
00044     float G[MaxTrk][5][5];     // Fitted track parameter covariances(CDF notation!)
00045     float TrkP4[6][MaxTrk];    // Track Px,Py,Pz,E,Pt P
00046     float VtxP4[MaxVtx][4];    // vertex 4-momentum sum
00047     float McnP4[MaxMcn][4];    // 4-momentum sum for mass constraint
00048     float DDA[8][MaxTrk];      // d(Px,Py)/d(Crv,Phi,Xs,Ys)
00049     int VOFF[MaxVtx];          // offset pointers into VMAT
00050     int TOFF[MaxTrk];          // offset pointers into VMAT
00051     int POFF[MaxVtx];          // offset pointers into VMAT
00052     int COFF[MaxVtx];          // offset pointers into VMAT
00053     int MOFF;                  // offset pointers into VMAT
00054     float PAR0[MaxTrk][5];     // Original track parameter values
00055     float PARDIF[MaxTrk][5];   // Parameter differences (fit - input)
00056     float FMCDIF[MaxMcn];      // Mass constraint residuals
00057     float PCON[2][MaxVtx];     // Pointing constraint tests
00058     float SANG[2][MaxVtx];     // Pointing constraint tests             
00059     float DRMAX,RVMAX,DZMAX;   // CTVMFA constants
00060     float TRNMAX,DSMIN;        // CTVMFA constants
00061     int IJKERR[3];             // error code reporting
00062     float PSCALE;              // Momentum scale conversion factor, from (cm)**-1 to Gev/c
00063     //  int junk[4]; missing mem
00064   } ctvmfq_;
00065   extern struct {
00066     double VMAT[MAXDIM+1][MAXDIM]; // Covariance matrix, fit parameters
00067   } ctvmfr_;
00068   void ctvmft_(int &PRINT, int& LEVPRT,int &IERR);
00069 };
00070 
00071 namespace VxLite {
00072 class LinearizedTrack;
00073 }
00074 std::vector<VxLite::LinearizedTrack*> gTracks;
00075 
00076 #endif
